description:
At Malloy Law Offices, LLC, we do much more than simply say that our clients are a priority. In every personal injury case we handle, we show it. Our Baltimore, Maryland, practice is marked by exceptional customer service:

  • Free initial consultations
  • No fee collected unless we win your case
  • Services in English, Spanish and Russian
  • Four locations serving Maryland, Virginia and Washington, D.C.
  • Virtual appointments available

From start to finish, the team at our law firm is on your side. We assess every way in which a catastrophic injury has interrupted your life. This information is imperative when fighting for maximum compensation in your case. Our attorneys consult with medical experts, law enforcement officers and other professionals to build a compelling case on your behalf. Taking this approach has resulted in more than $46 million going into the hands of people who have suffered the unthinkable.

Our decades of experience and proven legal tactics lead to a better future for clients of Malloy Law Offices, LLC. Due to our customer focus and proven results, our attorneys have earned a number of honors from the legal community, such as being selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers, listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100, listed in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best, and being named in Lawyers of Distinction.
